title: Fix SDK conversation service test mocking issues
description:
**Summary:**
SDK conversation service tests fail due to mocking incorrect module paths after refactoring.

**Affected Test File:**
- `tests/sdk/services/test_conversation_service.py` (12 failures)

**Root Cause:**
Tests mock attributes at old module locations that no longer exist after SDK refactoring.

**Related Issues:**
- SOUL-360: Update tests mocking removed/refactored module attributes

**Investigation Tasks:**
1. Identify current location of conversation service dependencies
2. Update mock paths to correct locations
3. Verify test assertions still valid after refactoring

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- [ ] All 12 conversation service tests pass
- [ ] Mock paths reference correct module locations
